Text:
yay! thank you, old games rule!  Spent the drive to work playing final fantasy IV on my snes emulator, now i'm addicted to that -what a bind, wings will of cource win:)  everyone else in the cal will be on the M25 but not me, i'll be in the skys above luxemburg circa 1943.

cheers again and have yourself a great new year.
Please, please, please say Supercars 1 & 2's here, best games ever..! =)
I second that comment on Super Cars, they are the BEST!!!
Sorry that PGA European Tour (Golf) is missing from these games. :(

I third those comments on Supercars, can't believe how much fun I had with them as a child.

"Do you have a police record?" "No, but I have a Sting album."

Thank you thank you thank you. Will seed for a long time.
